meanings.definition: Combine two identical molecules to form a dimer.
meanings.sent1: When you dimerize two small molecules, they join to create a larger structure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often dimerize certain compounds to study their properties.
meanings.sent3: I tried to dimerize my socks in the laundry, but they ended up mismatched!
meanings.sent4: Her passion for art and music dimerize beautifully in her latest masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick was to dimerize two separate scarves into one long, colorful ribbon.
